---
title: "RBI_CHEMO_analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

RBI_CHEMO_data<-read_csv("./RBI_CHEMO_data.csv")
RBI_nocanals<-read_csv("./RBI_CHEMO_nocanals.csv")  

RBI.linear<-ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se = FALSE)+
  labs(x="Richards-Baker Index", y="Chemostaticity Coeffiecient")


RBI.linear.abs<-ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE)+
  labs(x="Richards-Baker Index", 
       y="Chemostaticity Coeffiecient Absolute Value")

RBI.log<-ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE)+
  labs(x="Richards-Baker Index", y="log(Chemostaticity Coeffiecient)")

RBI.log.abs<-ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  scale_y_log10()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE)+
  labs(x="Richards-Baker Index", 
       y="log(Absulute Value Chemostaticity Coeffiecient)")

 

lm_sig<-lm(linregs.all~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)

lm_sig_abs<-lm(linregs.abs.all~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)


summary(lm_sig)
summary(lm_sig_abs)
```

```{r}
#same analysis, without canals in the data

Nocanals.linear<-ggplot(RBI_nocanals, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se = FALSE)+
  labs(x="Richards-Baker Index", y="Chemostaticity Coeffiecient")


Nocanals.linear.abs<-ggplot(RBI_nocanals, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs.all))+

  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE)+

       y="Absolute Value Chemostaticity Coeffiecient")

Nocanals.log<-ggplot(RBI_nocanals, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se = FALSE)+

Nocanals.log.abs<-ggplot(RBI_nocanals, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs.all))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  #scale_y_log10()+
```
